The minister of state vvherein is shewn, the true use of modern policy / by Monsievr de Silhon ... ; Englished by H. H. ... Minister d'estat. English Silhon, sieur de (Jean), 1596?-1667. Herbert, Henry, Sir, 1595-1673.
2 v.
Printed for Thomas Dring ..., London : 1658.
Volume 2 has title: The second part of The minister of state. Dedication to v. 2 signed: Henry Herbert. Imperfect: pt. 2 lacking on film. Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
